h:head.h:title: Mother and Newborn PNC Home Visit Service

bind.calculate: concat( concat( /postnatal_care_service/patient_age_in_years , if( /postnatal_care_service/patient_age_in_years =1,' year and ',' years and ')), concat( /postnatal_care_service/patient_age_in_months mod 12, if(( /postnatal_care_service/patient_age_in_months mod 12)=1,' month old',' months old')) )

bind.jr:constraintMsg: Date cannot be in the future or more than a year ago
Please confirm the number of babies born to a maximum of 7.
The number cannot be more than those delivered
None cannot be selected with any other option!
Date cannot be in the past
Date cannot be in the past
Date cannot be in the future
Please enter a valid identification number - between 8 and 20 characters in length
None cannot be selected with any other option!
None cannot be selected with any other option!
None cannot be selected with any other option!
None cannot be selected with any other option!

bind.calculate: if( /postnatal_care_service/insurance/has_upto_date_insurance = 'yes', 'Insurance upto date', 'Insurance not upto date')

if( /postnatal_care_service/days_since_delivery < 0, if(indexed-repeat( /postnatal_care_service/newborn_details/child/identification_type , /postnatal_care_service/newborn_details/child , position(..))='none', 'None', concat('Birth certificate No: ', indexed-repeat( /postnatal_care_service/newborn_details/child/identification_number , /postnatal_care_service/newborn_details/child , position(..)))), indexed-repeat( /postnatal_care_service/group_newborn_danger_signs_assessment/newborn_assessment/child_cert_id , /postnatal_care_service/group_newborn_danger_signs_assessment/newborn_assessment , position(..)))

if(indexed-repeat( /postnatal_care_service/newborn_details/child/has_disability , /postnatal_care_service/newborn_details/child , position(..))='no', 'None', concat(indexed-repeat( /postnatal_care_service/newborn_details/child/disabilities , /postnatal_care_service/newborn_details/child , position(..)), ' ', indexed-repeat( /postnatal_care_service/newborn_details/child/disabilities_other , /postnatal_care_service/newborn_details/child , position(..))))

if( /postnatal_care_service/days_since_delivery < 0, if(indexed-repeat( /postnatal_care_service/newborn_details/child/has_updated_immunization_status , /postnatal_care_service/newborn_details/child , position(..))='no', 'Not Upto date', 'Upto date'), if(indexed-repeat( /postnatal_care_service/group_newborn_danger_signs_assessment/newborn_assessment/c_has_updated_immunization_status , /postnatal_care_service/group_newborn_danger_signs_assessment/newborn_assessment , position(..))='no', 'Not Upto date', 'Upto date'))

sum( /postnatal_care_service/newborn_details/child/count_has_danger_signs ) > 0 or sum( /postnatal_care_service/newborn_details/child/count_has_imm_not_uptodate ) > 0 or sum( /postnatal_care_service/group_newborn_danger_signs_assessment/newborn_assessment/count_child_has_danger_signs ) > 0 or sum( /postnatal_care_service/group_newborn_danger_signs_assessment/newborn_assessment/c_count_has_imm_not_uptodate ) > 0

/postnatal_care_service/group_review/r_was_available ='true' and ((not(selected( /postnatal_care_service/group_maternal_mental_health/mental_signs , 'none')) and count-selected( /postnatal_care_service/group_maternal_mental_health/mental_signs ) > 0) or (not(selected( /postnatal_care_service/group_maternal_mental_health/observed_mental_signs , 'none')) and count-selected( /postnatal_care_service/group_maternal_mental_health/observed_mental_signs ) > 0) or (not(selected( /postnatal_care_service/group_mother_pnc_danger_signs/mother_danger_signs , 'none')) and count-selected( /postnatal_care_service/group_mother_pnc_danger_signs/mother_danger_signs ) > 0) or selected( /postnatal_care_service/group_mother_pnc_danger_signs/has_pnc_up_to_date , 'no'))

item.label: SAINT HELENA, ASCENSION AND TRISTAN DA CUNHA
SOUTH GEORGIA AND THE SOUTH SANDWICH ISLANDS
UNITED KINGDOM OF GREAT BRITAIN AND NORTHERN IRELAND

select1.label: What is the relationship to the household head?

input.label: **Encourage the to get a birth certificate.**

select.label: Ask for the following danger signs of newborn

item.label: Not able to feed since birth, or stopped feeding well
Fast breathing: Two counts of 60 breaths or more in one minute (Use a watch or timer)
Have a fever of 38 and above or hotness of the body?
Only moves when stimulated, or does not move even on stimulation.
Infected umbilicus red or draining pus, skin boils, or eyes draining pus

input.label: Press the timer and count number of breaths for a full 60 seconds two times. Fast breathing is when you count 60 breaths or more twice. (Use a watch or timer)
Use your thermometer to take the patient's temperature. Ensure you clean the thermometer with surgical spirit in cotton wool before and after use.
**Refer the child immediately to the health facility.**
Educate and Refer to the health facility.
Encourage the caregiver to continue adhering to the immunization schedule.

select1.label: Have you educated the caregiver on the above information?
